list_definition.definition: to (cause material, clothes etc to) become smaller

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: My jersey shrank in the wash
Do they shrink the material before they make it up into clothes?

list_definition.definition: to move back in fear, disgust etc (from)
to wish to avoid something unpleasant

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I shrank from telling him the terrible news.
